title: Spring Boot
subTitle: Building secure, high-performance back-end systems
overviewContent: Developed enterprise-grade, microservices-based applications using Spring Boot, delivering scalable and maintainable solutions in production environments. Designed and implemented robust RESTful APIs for seamless integration with diverse front-end and third-party systems. Applied Spring Security to enforce advanced security measures, including role-based access control, OAuth2/JWT authentication, CORS, and CSRF protection, ensuring system resilience against threats. Optimised modular architecture and configuration management to streamline deployment pipelines and enhance operational efficiency.

relatedProjects.projectName: H & H Lawyers Website and Server Migration
